metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8284 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** The disas_insn function in target/i386/translate.c in QEMU before 2.9.0, when TCG mode without hardware acceleration is used, does not limit the instruction size, which allows local users to gain privileges by creating a modified basic block that injects code into a setuid program, as demonstrated by procmail. NOTE: the vendor has stated "this bug does not violate any security guarantees QEMU makes."

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream disputed this has a security impact. Ignoring.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
